I have a question for the writers and producers of "Prozac Nation": What is the root cause and what is the solution to the widespread problem of personal and societal malaise? Near the beginning, after it's been established that outlaw John Dillinger (Warren Oates), is an egomaniacal rapist, his new love interest, sheriff's deputy Carol Hoover (Kathleen Lloyd), asks, "Are you a professional?" Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film. In Canada, he meets a similarly talented bodyguard (Michael Constantin) has just been hired to protect the President-elect (Louis and Steve Waldman).
